statements: SELECT * FROM royalty_info;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, royalty_amount FROM royalty_info WHERE producer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, payment_date FROM royalty_info ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, royalty_amount FROM royalty_info WHERE royalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY royalty_amount ASC;
SELECT producer_id, producer_name FROM royalty_info WHERE artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM royalty_info WHERE artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND producer_id = '987e6543-a21b-34c5-d678-901234567890';
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, payment_date FROM royalty_info WHERE royalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, SUM(royalty_amount) AS total_royalties FROM royalty_info GROUP BY artist_name, producer_name;
SELECT artist_name, AVG(royalty_amount) AS average_royalties FROM royalty_info GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(producer_id) > 1;
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, payment_date FROM royalty_info WHERE artist_name LIKE '%John%' OR producer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY artist_name ASC, producer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY artist_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_artists FROM artists;
SELECT producer_name, production_company FROM producers WHERE royalty_percentage > 10;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop'
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE artist_id > 100 ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT producer_name, production_company FROM producers WHERE royalty_percentage > 0.1 ORDER BY producer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND artist_name LIKE 'The%'
SELECT producer_name, AVG(royalty_percentage) AS average_royalty FROM producers GROUP BY producer_name HAVING AVG(royalty_percentage) > 0.15 ORDER BY average_royalty DESC
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, royalty_amount FROM artists;
SELECT producer_name, producer_id, royalty_percentage FROM producers;
SELECT artist_id, producer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE royalty_amount > 500;
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, payment_amount FROM artists JOIN payments ON artists.artist_id = payments.artist_id JOIN producers ON payments.producer_id = producers.producer_id;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, royalty_amount FROM artists ORDER BY royalty_amount DESC;
SELECT artist_name, payment_amount FROM artists JOIN payments ON artists.artist_id = payments.artist_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT producer_name FROM producers;
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, payment_amount FROM artists JOIN payments ON artists.artist_id = payments.artist_id JOIN producers ON payments.producer_id = producers.producer_id;
SELECT * FROM artist;
SELECT artist_name, royalty_percentage FROM artist WHERE royalty_percentage > 0;
SELECT song_title, genre, release_date FROM song ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT producer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM producer JOIN payment ON producer.producer_id = payment.producer_id GROUP BY producer_name;
SELECT artist.artist_name, song.song_title, payment.payment_amount FROM artist JOIN payment ON artist.artist_id = payment.artist_id JOIN song ON payment.song_id = song.song_id;
SELECT * FROM artist;
SELECT artist_name, royalty_percentage FROM artist ORDER BY royalty_percentage DESC;
SELECT producer_name, production_company FROM producer WHERE production_company IS NOT NULL;
SELECT song_title, release_date FROM song WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT artist.artist_name, producer.producer_name, payment.payment_amount FROM artist JOIN payment ON artist.artist_id = payment.artist_id JOIN producer ON payment.producer_id = producer.producer_id ORDER BY payment.payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, royalty_rate FROM artists;
SELECT * FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, producer_name, song_name FROM artists INNER JOIN royalties ON artists.artist_id = royalties.artist_id;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, royalty_rate FROM artists WHERE royalty_rate > 0.05;
SELECT producer_name, COUNT(royalties.*) AS royalty_count FROM producers JOIN royalties ON producers.producer_id = royalties.producer_id GROUP BY producer_name;

SELECT artist_name, producer_name, royalty_amount FROM artists JOIN royalties ON artists.artist_id = royalties.artist_id JOIN producers ON royalties.producer_id = producers.producer_id WHERE royalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY royalty_amount DESC;
